definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: Beauty of love, always as the miserable Bana general.
sentences.chinese: 凄美的爱情，总是如彼岸花壹般的凄惨。

sentences.english: When the dreams crush to reality, it smashed. That's always made a sound of misery.
sentences.chinese: 当梦想遭到现实的撞击时，总会发出凄美的破碎声。

sentences.english: To my memory, write down the beautiful one.
sentences.chinese: 给我的记忆里，写下凄美的一笔。

sentences.english: Butterfly is always a winning embodiment of melancholy for Chinese people.

sentences.english: The most beautiful love, hutianqiangde not only care.
sentences.chinese: 最凄美的爱，不必呼天抢地，只是相顾无言。

sentences.english: This is, to me, the loveliest and saddest landscape in the world.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，这是世界上最美也是最凄美的地方。

sentences.english: Seoul Tower at night and in the day… looks different.
sentences.chinese: 而白天的南山塔，秋风瑟瑟，一种凋零而凄美的景象。

sentences.english: Do you know a chilly and beautiful fable about the Yalong Bay?
sentences.chinese: 你知道一个关于亚龙湾凄美的传说吗？

sentences.english: But to some, it can be so horrific that it becomes extremely beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 那是如此的恐怖以致于变得异常地凄美。

sentences.chinese: 凄美地爱情，老是如彼岸花壹般地凄惨。

sentences.english: Why does the photocathode through the millennium, but it will continue to be so poignant?
sentences.chinese: 为什么穿越千年的光阴，却依然会是如此凄美？

sentences.english: Braveheart------ . A hero fighting for freedom, some inspired by the tragic history of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 一个为自由而战的英雄，一段凄美悲壮的诗史。

sentences.english: Leaves that fall down during the middle of summer are entitled a kind of sad beauty of the strong season.
sentences.chinese: 有棕榈树的小岛仲夏的落叶，有种盛势下的凄美。

sentences.english: Kinda sad, but kinda beautiful too.
sentences.chinese: 些许伤感，但也些许凄美。

definition: (of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
